name: DIOGENIS Drug Policy Dialogue
goal:
The organization's objectives are to:
• Promote objective and open dialogue at national, regional and international level in order to achieve a coherent, consistent and effective drug policy.
• Study the drug phenomenon in Greece and in South East Europe, with special reference to the geopolitical and cultural characteristics of the countries in the region
• Develop national, inter-Balkan and international cooperation and partnerships with networks to influence drug policy both in terms of protecting public health and safety and reduce supply and demand.
• Develop participatory social action and provide information to individuals the public about the effects of drug use and responses to the problem, and help to implement programs for prevention, harm reduction and treatment in collaboration with specialized institutions and agencies.
• Identify and promote effective policies and practices in other countries or regions of the world, inform, make aware and mobilize public opinion and public administrations (national and local governments and the public sector in general) in favour of European and Global initiatives to tackle the negative effects of production, trafficking and drug use.
• support national and regional cooperation and coordination of NGOs working in the field of drugs and establish good relations with experts, scientists and policy makers responsible for drug policy.
Diogenis seeks to achieve its objectives through:
• Close cooperation between non-governmental organizations and responsible governmental institutions and services and scientific and research centres at national, Balkan, European and international level.
• Support and coordination of networks among NGOs at national and regional level
• Organize informal drug policy dialogues and open public discussions and lectures, comment on relevant news and make proposals to competent authorities for improvement and modernization of the existing drug control system
• The publication of researches, reports and newsletters and the organization of electronic archive with information and analyses of relevant drug related issues.
interests: Home Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives:
-EU drug strategy and action plan
-EU regulation on New Psychoactive Substances
